title: How does the NWEA MAP Work?

traits.title: Adaptive
traits.description: NWEA MAP responds to how your student is performing, getting harder or easier to gain a better understanding of their abilities.

traits.title: Subject Based
traits.description: ${student.name.first} takes one test per subject area. ${student.pronouns.possessiveUpper} most recent testing was in Reading and Math.

traits.title: Reoccurring
traits.description:
${student.name.first} takes the NWEA MAP assessment 3-4 times per year.

Normally once in the in the fall, winter and spring.

traits.title: Normative
traits.description: ${student.name.possessive} NWEA MAP Scores can be easily compared to students in ${student.pronouns.possessive} grade level all across the country.
